item.title: Fixing a corrupted partition on a virtual machine
item.description: If you ever find the following error while using vagrant or simply when booting a virtual machine, we’ll later see how to solve it. Couldn't remount RDWR because of unprocessed orphan inode list. Download an Ubuntu ISO Boot the virtualmachine from the ISO file: Settings -> Storage -> Add CD/DVD Device -> Choose disk Umount /dev/sda1: sudo umount /dev/sda1 Check damaged partition fsck /dev/sda1 You’ll see some questions, you should answer yes to everything.
